name: Codename: Final Form
storyline: The game will take players on an action-packed adventure as a humanoid avatar of a sentient spaceship. Eventually, the mission will expand beyond the edge of the known universe as the players try to beat an unstoppable plague and protect the last celestial being, the very essence of creation and life.
summary: In Codename Final Form, players will take on the role of a humanoid robot. Set in the far reaches of the universe – beyond what we even know – you’ll be tasked with trying to protect the last celestial being; the thing that is responsible for all life and creation.
